title: mAl maruganEy
sahitya:
mAl maruganai manamE ninaindiru

vEl muruganai vinai tIra tudittiru

 

anupallavi

 

nAlvagai maRraiporuLAi viLangum

bAla murugandan pAdamE paNindiru  

caraNam

 

nIlamaNi sUDum nimalanai

kOlamayil ERum kumaranai

shIlamigu asura samaranai

gnAlam valam vanda naLina porpAdanin

kanda nadai (kaNda naDai)

kanda  nadai  konjum  avan kARccilm bolikkum

candamuDan cintaikavar cindu kavi mazhai pozhiyum
